title: Palmiers (Sugar)
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°. Sprinkle 1/4 c sugar on work surface. Unfold pastry on sugar and sprinkle with 2 Tbsp sugar. Roll into 12x10 inch rectangle. With short side facing you, fold both short sides to meet at center. Fold in half like closing a book. Cut into 1/2 inch slices. Place cut side down on parchment-lined baking sheet. Sprinkle with remaining sugar. Bake 6 minutes. Turn cookies over and bake 5-6 minutes more until golden.
